root: ^Now you have the knowledge to repair the components required for the warp system!
^I have already repaired the base part of the warp core, the improbability module.
^You can go ahead and give the schema of the things you learned to the 3D hyperdrive printing modules on the right and left side of the room.
^The 3D hyperdrive modules are quite smart, so as long as you give them a generally good schema they'll understand what is required for the ship!
